Instruction: Preheat oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit (200 degrees Celsius). Prepare two baking sheets by greasing them.
Brush a mixture of butter, salt, brown sugar, and cinnamon onto the sweet potato slices arranged in a single layer on baking sheets.
Bake in the oven until the sweet potato slices are tender and lightly caramelized, approximately 20 to 25 minutes.
